医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
研究发现4F-PCC在减少心脏手术后降低出血时高于冷冻血浆根据美国心脏病学院年度科学学院（ACC.25）的一项研究，在心脏手术期间患有过度出血的患者中，一种含有蛋白质的浓缩血液产物比冻结血浆更有效，并造成更少的不良反应（标准疗法）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/study-finds-4f-pcc-superior-to-frozen-plasma-plasma-in-reducing-reducing-bleeding--flead- ferter-cardiac-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/study-finds-4f-pcc-superior-to-frozen-plasma-plasma-in-reducing-bleeding-bleeding-flater-ferfter-ferter-cardiac-sugergery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33787E56-B8B3-4544-B9FC-BFC-BF6408F3BC5D Sat, 29 Mar 2025 14:10:00 -0400 Study finds 4F-PCC superior to frozen plasma in reducing bleeding after cardiac surgery
研究揭示了支架植入后双重抗血小板疗法的最佳持续时间植入支架的患者在手术后的几个月内植入了阻塞的冠状动脉会面临双重风险和出血过多的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/research-reveals-eptimal-duration-duration-dul-antiplelet-thiplatelet-therapy-theraphy-therapy-therapy-therapy-ferter-ferter-stent-implantation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/research-reveals-eptimal-duration-duration-dual-antiplelet-thipletlet-therapy-therapy-therapy-therapy-theraphy-perter-hefter-Stent-intplantation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=901D02AC-3879-480C-B64A-241EBD4CD1AB Sat, 29 Mar 2025 14:02:00 -0400 Research reveals optimal duration of dual antiplatelet therapy after stent implantation
剂量降低的apixaban被证明有效预防癌症患者的血块复发患有活跃癌症的患者患有血凝块或静脉血栓栓塞（VTE），并接受血液胰药物治疗至少六个月，随后再进行12个月的低剂量apixaban，经历了类似的VTE复发，而较少出血的患者较少出血，这些患者接受了类似的患者，他们接受了口服血液稀释的药物的全剂量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/reduced-dose-dose-apixaban-proves-effelcection-encective-in-in-preventing-in-preventing-blood-clot-clot-clot-clot-recurrence in-cancer-in-cancer-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/reduced-dose-dose-apixaban-proves-effercection-encective-in-in-preventing-in-preventing-clood-clot-clot-clot-clot-cancurrence in-cancer-cancer-cancer-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8Afda18f-e001-4d5f-8cd-8cd1-262b6fa359 Sat, 29 Mar 2025 13:51:00 -0400 Reduced-dose apixaban proves effective in preventing blood clot recurrence in cancer patients
研究旨在确定冠心病中他汀类药物处方的最佳方法盐湖城Intermountain Health的研究人员的一项新研究旨在确定筛查和评估患冠心病风险的患者的最佳方法，哪些患者将受益于服用他汀类药物来降低胆固醇。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/study-aims-to-determine-best-best-method-method-for-statin-prescription-in-corronary heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/study-aims-to-determine-best-best-method-method-for-statin-prescription-in-corronary heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc986c96c96-098d-4b1d-9be8-3778787cf72bdc Sat, 29 Mar 2025 13:43:00 -0400 Study aims to determine best method for statin prescription in coronary heart disease
Rivaroxaban证明是华法林左心室血栓的可行替代品在随访的三个月后，患有严重心脏病发作的患者接受了口腔血液稀释剂治疗左心室的血凝块，以及接受过较年长的血液胰药物Warfarin的标准治疗的类似患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/rivaroxaban-shown-to-be-be-a-vial-vible-- anternative-to-warfarin-for-lefor-lef-left-left-left-leftricular-thrombus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/rivaroxaban-shown-to-be-be-be-a-vible-- alternative-to-warfarin-for---- lefor-left-left-ventricular-thrombus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=812AA9CA-1600-40C2-A49F-669B3ECAF4E1 Sat, 29 Mar 2025 13:35:00 -0400 Rivaroxaban shown to be a viable alternative to warfarin for left ventricular thrombus
零冠状动脉钙评分可预测任何年龄段的低心脏风险通常将冠状动脉钙（CAC）得分为零，通常被认为是在未来五年内发生心脏事件的非常低风险的标志。但是，年龄是导致冠状动脉风险的重要贡献，随着人们的年龄，风险明显增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/zero-coronary-artery-artery-calcium-score-predicts-low-hend heart-row-heart-clisk-at-an-age-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/zero-coronary-artery-artery-calcium-score-predicts-low-hend-hard-row-row-risk-alisk-at-y-any-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bebc5820-a306-4999-bcf9-805e48d69ec8 Sat, 29 Mar 2025 13:26:00 -0400 Zero coronary artery calcium score predicts low heart risk at any age
新的ESC共识声明进步传导系统起搏疗法欧洲心脏病学会（ESC）发布了关于传导系统起搏（CSP）的开创性共识声明，标志着起搏疗法的发展是一个重要的里程碑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/new-esc-consensus-sensus-sensus-statement-advances-conduction-system-system-pacing-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/new-esc-consensus-sensus-sensus-statement-advances-conduction-conduction-system-pacing-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f304d294-6108-4617-4617-802F-14DD259F46FB Sat, 29 Mar 2025 13:18:00 -0400 New ESC consensus statement advances conduction system pacing therapy
Owlstone Medical从囊性纤维化基金会获得投资Owlstone Medical ("Owlstone"), the global leader in Breath Biopsy® for applications in early disease detection and precision medicine, today announced that the Cystic Fibrosis Foundation has made an up to USD $2.3 million equity investment (circa £1.7 million) in Owlstone to develop a breath test for Pseudomonas aeruginosa (PA) detection in patients with cystic fibrosis (CF). https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/owlstone-medical-secures-secures-investment-from-cystic-fibrosis-foundation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/owlstone-medical-secures-secures-investment-from-cystic-fibrosis-foundation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f213dc7-96d3-4599-4599-9c86-0756ac793e4f Sat, 29 Mar 2025 00:40:00 -0400 Owlstone Medical secures investment from Cystic Fibrosis Foundation
巨人基金会和美国心脏协会促进挽救生命的心肺复苏术技能美国心脏协会和巨人基金会是纽约巨人的非营利组织，从3月20日在Metlife Stadium招募了12所当地学校的代表进行心肺复苏（CPR）和自动化的外部除颤器（AED）培训。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/the-giants-foundation-and-merican-hend-shert-association-promote-life-saving-cpr-skills.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/the-giants-foundation-and-merican-hend-shert-association-promote-life-saving-saving-cpr-skills.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=391d852b-d0a4-4eb4-4eb4-adeb-b5bf96ae2c77 Fri, 28 Mar 2025 23:37:00 -0400 The Giants Foundation and American Heart Association promote life-saving CPR skills
研究发现某些癌症中如何发生对化学疗法的耐药性弥米布林格将军的研究人员发现了某些癌症对化学疗法的耐药性如何发生。研究人员专注于利用活性氧（ROS）杀死癌细胞的途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/study-uncovers-how-esistance-to-chemotherapies-may-ccur-in-some-insome-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/study-uncovers-how-esistance-to-chemotherapies-may-ccur-in-some-insome-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bded2863-7ad3-43a4-88b1-52fcfb98d7b8 Fri, 28 Mar 2025 23:34:00 -0400 Study uncovers how resistance to chemotherapies may occur in some cancers
